to have it initially load with placeholder widgets for how many reports

of the information at once so by doing stacked calls I'm able to get more
information it's a much more responsive page and people are much happier and they're not pulling my database over and
over and over again from the reports screen because there's no data it says no data so they're just hitting it over and over and I was having to kill that

responses to high probability requests so another thing that I was able to do
for this project was I knew that people were going to be going to this report screen so every 15 minutes or so I take
a snapshot of the likely reports that are going to run for each client and
